Class KLHMath

Provides calculation formulas to be used in KLH data visualisation.

Inheritance

AverageTemperatureOfZone(BuildingZone)

Estimate the average outdoor temperature of the area the building is situated in. Values are from Kaukolämmön Käsikirja p. 52 table 3.1.

Declaration
public static float AverageTemperatureOfZone(BuildingZone _zone)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BuildingZone _zone

Building Zone (I-IV) which defines the average temperature.
Returns
Type Description
System.Single

Average temperature of the zone.

HeatGainFromTotalHeatLoad(Int32, Int32, Int32, Int32, Single, StructureComposition, Int32)

Calculate the specific heat gain of a building. The total specific heat gain is a ratio of the total heat load generated by different sources.

Declaration

The amount of energy needed to replace the heat lost by conduction through the building envelope.

System.Int32 _heatLossThroughReplacementAir
System.Single _tempDiff

The difference between indoor temperature and average outside temperature of the measured timespan in Celcius.

The gross volume of the building in cubic metres.
System.Single _tempDiff

The rate at which the air is completely replaced in a space (1/h).

Returns

HeatLossThroughVentilation(Int32, Single, Single, Single, Single, Int32)

Calculate the total energy needed to heat the incoming air through ventilation.

Declaration
public static int HeatLossThroughVentilation(int _grossBuildingVolume, float _activityRatioPerDay, float _activityRatioPerWeek, float _operatingEfficiencyOfHeatRecovery, float _tempDiff, int _durationInHours = 8760)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 _grossBuildingVolume

Gross volume of the building in cubic metres.
System.Single _activityRatioPerDay

A ratio between 0...1 that represents the daily activity of the system.
System.Single _activityRatioPerWeek

A ratio between 0...1 that represents the weekly activity of the system.
System.Single _operatingEfficiencyOfHeatRecovery

A ratio between 0...1 that represents the coefficiency of the heat recovery (0.25 means the system has a coefficiency of 25%).
System.Single _tempDiff

The difference between indoor temperature and average outside temperature of the measured timespan in Celcius.
System.Int32 _durationInHours

The duration of the measured timespan in hours (default 8760 = one year).
Returns
Type Description
System.Int32

Estimated energy needed to cover the heat loss through ventilation over the measured timespan in kWh.
